name: Don't Get Sucked In!
description:
This is a Ludum Dare 50 entry. #LDJAM #LD46 
Page: https://ldj.am/$288299

This is my fourteenth time to attend Ludum Dare. Hope that everyone will enjoy my game :) This is an action game that we have to control our car to dodge obstacles in order to not get sucked in by the black hole!

Game Goal
  • Control your car to survive as long as possible!
Control
  • Use mouse cursor to control the car.
Used tools
  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Version Control: GitKraken
  • Project Management: Miro

Designed and made by Cliff Lee CL.
